Nightstrike:

"So the BOssy Megatron is now an useful weapon"said 
Nightstrike "That's good!!!! Now we can work better to reach our true 
commander's goals"

Nighstrike moved to Firestrike's position.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Firestrike smiled.  He would enjoy telling this news.  "Megatron 
> has been defeated.  And is now a usefull weapon to me.  Our real 
> commander, Switchblade, is now in control."  As the rhino pounded 
> over the dry soil he looked on into the sun hard.  "Now get you ass 
> and gear and get to my position.  WE ARE DOING THIS STRIKE 
> STYLE.  You will do a fly-by with some quickmissiles then I hit 
> them on the ground.  You better cover me too."
